00312 typedef struct {
00313     enum {
00314         UA_JOBTYPE_NOTHING,
00315         UA_JOBTYPE_DETACHCONNECTION,
00316         UA_JOBTYPE_BINARYMESSAGE,
00317         UA_JOBTYPE_METHODCALL,
00318         UA_JOBTYPE_DELAYEDMETHODCALL,
00319     } type;
00320     union {
00321         UA_Connection *closeConnection;
00322         struct {
00323             UA_Connection *connection;
00324             UA_ByteString message;
00325         } binaryMessage;
00326         struct {
00327             void *data;
00328             void (*method)(UA_Server *server, void *data);
00329         } methodCall;
00330     } job;
00331 } UA_Job;
